Question: A jeep driven by a roommate from flight school picked this person up; it is unknown what happened to the wreckage of No.
Hints: This person and the group spent the rest of the night drinking scotch and discussing what had happened.
At the bottom of the ladder, this person said "I'm going to step off the LEM now" (referring to the Apollo Lunar Module).
As vice-chairman, this person was in charge of the operational side of the commission.
